short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get high-res artwork for apps, music, books, movies, TV shows, and more, all types supported.
short.zh_CN: 获取全高清的应用图标、专辑封面、图书封面、电影海报等等。支持所有 iTunes 以及 Mac App Store 商店中的内容
short.zh_TW: 獲取取全高清的應用圖標、專輯封麵、圖書封麵、電影海報等等。支持所有 iTunes 以及 Mac App Store 商店中的內容

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yet another artwork grabber for cover / icon lovers. Get high-res artwork for apps, music, books, movies, TV shows, podcasts and more, all types supported. Works with Google Chrome, and Greasemonkey / Tampermonkey / Scriptish / etc. And it's open-sourced: https://github.com/sparanoid/itunes-artwork-grabber
long.zh_CN,zh_TW: Yet another iTunes artwork grabber for cover / icon lovers. Get high-res artwork for apps, music, books, movies, TV shows, podcasts and more, all types supported. Works with Safari, Google Chrome, and Greasemonkey / Tampermonkey / Scriptish / etc.
